announcements.title: PTA General Assembly Meeting - October 15, 2025
announcements.content:
Dear Parents and Guardians,

You are cordially invited to attend the PTA General Assembly Meeting on October 15, 2025, at 2:00 PM in the JHCSC Audio Visual Room.

Agenda:
- Welcome and Opening Prayer
- Reading of Minutes from Previous Meeting
- Financial Report
- Discussion of School Improvement Projects
- New Business
- Adjournment

Your presence and participation are highly valued.

Thank you.

announcements.title: School Fair Fundraising Event - November 20, 2025
announcements.content:
Join us for the JHCSC School Fair on November 20, 2025! This annual fundraising event will feature games, food booths, performances, and exciting prizes.

Event Details:
- Date: November 20, 2025
- Time: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
- Venue: JHCSC School Grounds

We need volunteers for various activities. Please contact the PTA office if you can help.

Let's make this year's school fair the best one yet!

announcements.title: Monthly Dues Payment Reminder
announcements.content:
This is a friendly reminder that October 2025 monthly dues are now due. Please settle your payment by October 31, 2025.

Payment Details:
- Amount: ₱150.00 per student
- Payment Methods: Cash, GCash, Bank Transfer
- Payment Location: PTA Office or during meetings

For GCash payments, please send to: 09123456789 (Maria Santos)
For bank transfers, use account: BPI 1234567890

Thank you for your continued support!

announcements.title: Library Enhancement Project Update
announcements.content:
We are pleased to announce the launch of our Library Enhancement Project! This initiative aims to improve our school library with new books, computers, and reading spaces.

Project Goals:
- Purchase 500 new books
- Install 10 new computers
- Create comfortable reading areas
- Implement digital library system

Target Amount: ₱250,000
Current Progress: ₱75,000 (30%)

Special contribution opportunities are available. Thank you to all parents who have already contributed!

announcements.title: Christmas Program Planning
announcements.content:
The Christmas season is approaching! The PTA is now planning for this year's Christmas program.

Planning Meeting:
- Date: October 25, 2025
- Time: 3:00 PM
- Venue: Music Room

We need volunteers for:
- Stage decoration
- Costume preparation
- Sound and lighting
- Food preparation
- Program coordination

Please join us in making this Christmas celebration memorable for our students!
